title: U.S. sulfur dioxide emissions 1970 to 2017
yAxis: Volume of emissions in thousand tons
summary: Overall Volume of emissions in thousand tons has decreased over the Year.
Volume of emissions in thousand tons is slightly decreasing from 2000 to 2010.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2005.
The highest Volume of emissions in thousand tons, of value 16347.0 was reached at Year 2000
The lowest Volume of emissions in thousand tons, of value 7732.0 was reported at Year 2010
